name: Notion Credit Card Expenses Tracker

features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Easy to create transactions to track daily credit card dues in a simple and intuitive interface.; Set your own credit card expense categories, assign budget for each, and keep expenses in check under one dashboard.; Provides Expenses Overview, Notifications for payments, Monthly and Yearly Overview of all expenses.; Available for MacOS, Windows OS, iOS and Android devices.; Complete Credit Card Expenses Overview Dashboard; Credit Card Expenses Tracker; Complete Interactive Guide; Credit Card Expense Tracker ($9 Value)
